name: 洪克銘
objective:
本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之各種烯烴與芳香烴工業。隨著環保意識高漲，石油工業發展面臨，工安、環保、節能減碳、水資源、化石能源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰以及面對產業轉型之石化高值化，也是本課程之目標。
Topics covered: 
1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture.
2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application
4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 
5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel
6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry
schedule:
Course Syllabus
1. Introduction : Petroleum Refining & Petrochemical Industries 煉油與石化工 
    業簡介  (1st week)
2. Basic principles for Petroleum Refining 石油產品與煉製原理  (2nd~3rd 
    weeks)
3. Refining Technologies：Fractionation、Hydrofining、Reforming、 FCC 、 
    RFCC、RDS and relates Processes 煉製技術  (4th~7th weeks).
4. Group Discussion (I) & Midterm 專題討論及期中測驗  (8th~9th weeks) 
5. Naphtha Cracking & Petrochemicals 輕油裂解與石化工業  (10th~12th 
    weeks)
6. Shale Gas & Its impact to Refining & Petrochemical Industries 頁岩油氣對煉 
    油與石化之衝擊  (13th week)
7. Carbon reduction、Energy Conservation & sustainability Issue 減碳、節能 
    與永續之議題  (14th~15th week)
8. Group Discussion (II) 專題討論 (二)  (16th~17th weeks)
9.Final Exam 期末測驗  (18th week)
scorePolicy:
出席與學習態度 20%
Presentation & Report  40%
Final Exam  40%
